page.title: 06EDUCATION(1)
page.content: There are 20 schools in the area.12 of which are state schools and 8 are church schools.These consist of:- Seven Stars County Nursery and Infants-250 Earnshaw Bridge County Infants-209 Leyland Methodist Infants-194 St Mary's R.C. Infants-220 St Andrew's C.of E. Infants-151 Farington County Junior and Infants-210 Lancaster Lane Junior and Infants-167 Lever House Junior and Infants-198 St Catherines R.C. Junior and Infants-260 St James' C. of E. Junior and Infants-219 Broadfield County Junior School-303 Leyland Methodist Junior-272 Seven Stars County Junior-197 St Mary's R.C. Junior-197
